meanings.definition: Extended beyond a safe or reasonable limit.
meanings.sent1: The tree branches were overextended, reaching far out into the yard.
meanings.sent2: The rubber band was overextended and snapped with a loud twang.
meanings.sent3: The cat's tail looked overextended as it puffed up in fear.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was overextended, like a rubber band stretched too thin.
meanings.sent5: The bridge was overextended, barely holding the weight of the heavy truck.

meanings.sent1: The overextended rope finally snapped under the weight of the heavy load.
meanings.sent2: Her arm muscles felt overextended after lifting the heavy boxes all day.
meanings.sent3: The balloon looked comically overextended as it struggled to stay afloat.
meanings.sent4: His smile seemed overextended, as if it couldn't stretch any further.
meanings.sent5: The overextended rubber band made a loud snapping sound when it broke.

meanings.sent1: They found themselves overextended after splurging on unnecessary luxuries.
meanings.sent2: Being overextended with credit card debt can lead to financial stress.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank looked overextended with all the coins stuffed inside.
meanings.sent4: Her budget was overextended, like a balloon about to burst.
meanings.sent5: The overextended bank account left them struggling to make ends meet.
